body_html: I was able to get 68x68 images reading/decoding from TF-examples fast enough to saturate my K40 with input pipeline using 6 threads/1 CPU. These tutorials have not been tuned to work efficiently on GPU, so there could be some small ops that are placed on GPU suboptimally and are causing unnecessary data transfers -- try pinning your input pipeline to CPU manually. See #838 for an example of suboptimal placement making GPU version run 100x slower

body: I was able to get 68x68 images reading/decoding from TF-examples fast enough to saturate my K40 with input pipeline using 6 threads/1 CPU. These tutorials have not been tuned to work efficiently on GPU, so there could be some small ops that are placed on GPU suboptimally and are causing unnecessary data transfers -- try pinning your input pipeline to CPU manually. See #838 for an example of suboptimal placement making GPU version run 100x slower
